summary:
This mod adds a new set of clothing for female characters, UNP, UNPC HDT, 7bO HDT, 7b Bombshell HDT, UNPB HDT
UUNP Bodyslide HDT files available.

The outfit includes a top, trousers, an armlet, and a scarf.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][center][b][i]-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]Description:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------

This mod adds a new set of clothing for female characters, UNP bodytype, also available for UNPC HDT, 7bO HDT, 7b Bombshell HDT, UNPB HDT
[b][i][b][i]UUNP Bodyslide HDT files available.[/i][/b][/i][/b]
The outfit includes a top, trousers, an armlet, and a scarf.
Everything is both craftable and enchantable.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85300/?]
CBBE HDT Conversion here[/url]

[b][size=2][size=3][i]My other works:[/i][/size]

Standalone Outfits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81227/?]Lind's Spellslinger Outfit[/url]
[/size][/b][/i][/b][i][size=2][/size][/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80826/?][i][size=2]Lind's Woodland Alchemist Dress[/size][/i][b][i][b][size=2][/size][/b][/i][/b][/url][b][i][b][size=2]

[i]Custom Eyes:[/i]
[/size][/b][i][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/?]Lind's Human Eyes - 50 New High-Res Eyes to all human races[/url][/size][/i][b][size=2]
[/size][/b][i][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948/?]Lind's Elven Eyes - 40 New High-Res Eyes to all elven races[/url][/size][/i]

[b][i]Robes Texture Replacers:[/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72751/?]Robes of Vaermina[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36817/?]Monk - Priest of the Divines[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70920/?]Green - The Bosmer Mage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36078/?]Red - The Battlemage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59734/?]Blue - Court Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59769/?]Brown - The Wandering Wizard[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36173/?]Grey - The Moth Priest[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36049/?]Necromancer Robes - The King of Worms[/url]

[b][i]Standalone Robes[/i][/b]:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74242/?][i]Lind's Standalone Robes Pack 01[/i][/url]
[url=http://lindsworkshop.tumblr.com]

[/url][url=http://lindsworkshop.tumblr.com/]You can stay updated on what I'm doing through my Tumblr.

[img]https://s10.postimg.org/hbzh6ysyx/Tumblr_Banner.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://twitter.com/LindsRealm]Or Twitter

[img]https://s10.postimg.org/azkbx4pwp/Twitter_Banner.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/lindsrealm/]You can also find screenshots of my mods and characters in full resolution on my Flickr

[img]https://s10.postimg.org/g8fcv08bt/Flickr_Banner.png[/img][/url]
-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]More Informations & Installation:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------

[youtube]MCdiAmCPuWs[/youtube]

To manually install the mod simply merge the data folder contained in my archive
with the data folder already present in your Skyrim directory.

Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim

10/18/2016

[img]http://i.imgur.com/emPSJIO.png[/img]

Thank you! (:

-----------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=4]F.A.Q.:[/size][/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------

[i][color=#dd7e6b][/color][/i][b][i][b][i]
[i][color=#dd7e6b]Q: How do I obtain the outfit?[/color]
[b]A: Every piece of the outfit can be crafted at a Tanning Rack upon collecting all the required materials.[/b]
[color=#f9cb9c]
Q: Can the parts be enchanted?[/color]
[b]A: I figured why not, so yes, every part can be enchanted. After all if you don't want them
enchanted you can just leave them unenchanted.[/b]
[color=#dd7e6b]
Q: Can you release any of the characters in the screenshots?[/color]
[b]A: Absolutely not.
There's many reasons for this, read [url=http://lindsworkshop.tumblr.com/post/154295559356/i-was-wondering-when-you-might-release-the]this blog post [/url]if you want to know more.
[/b]
[color=#f9cb9c]Q: How about as ECE/RM Presets?[/color]
A: Absolutely not. Besides, without my mods they'd look nothing like what you see.
[color=#dd7e6b]
Q: Is this compatible with X ?[/color]
[b]A: It's an outfit, so as long as you wear it with the correct body shape it should be all good. (:[/b][/i]

[color=#f9cb9c]Q: How do you get the ears to look like that?[/color]
A: Through Racemenu 3.0 and above, by expired, I manually edit them in the sculpt tab.[/i][/b][/i][/b]

------------------[/i][/b][b][i]------------------[/i][/b]
[size=3]Credits[/size]:
------------------[b][i]------------------[/i][/b]
Credits are important, please take the time to read them.
Remember this mod would not exist without the work of these authors.


Assets:[/center][/i][/b]
(NSFW)[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?] UNP Body type[/url] by dimon99 [b][i]- Body Mesh[/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses[/url] Collection by Tiwa44 - [i][b]Top and pants Meshes[/b][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11767/?]Dragons Crown Sorceress [/url]outfit by Backsteppo [i][b]- Armlet Mesh[/b][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16660/?]Scarves of Skyrim[/url] by Natterforme - [b][i]Scarf Mesh
[/i][/b][url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=halofarm]Halofarm[/url] for letting me use his HoD box as my ground mesh.

[i]Go, go! endorse their work if you haven't already! (;[/i]
[center]
[b][i]Conversions:[/i][/b][/center][b]
[/b]UNPC HDT, 7BO HDT, 7B Bombshell HDT, UNPB HDT, UUNP Bodyslide HDT conversions by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/3920499/?]Diablio[/url]

[center][i][b]Screenshots:
[/b][/i][/center]
Halo's Poser by Halofarm (Poses)
GomaPeroPero's Poser by GomaPeroPero (Poses)
Eiries' Edit of Kountervibe ENB (ENB, duh.)
Ultimate Assortment by FavouredSoul (Earrings)
[i][center][b]Special thanks:[/b]
[i][i][b]
[size=2][b][i][b][i][i][i][i][b]to Mike G. , Timo L. , Angrylock[/b] , [b]vintagelf[/b][i][b], [i][b]Geir J. R.[/b][/i][/b] [b], David T. , xCrmisonSky[/b][/i], Kevin R., Jessica R., Scott M., Denis I., Kiria W.[/i][/i][/i][/i][/b][/i][/b][/size][/b]

Thank you for your donations, it was unexpected, but I really appreciated them. (:[/i][/i]

Halofarm for putting up with all my crap.
My Tumblr followers for providing suggestions and constant feedback.[/center][/i]
